В Team Fortress 2 игрок может играть за один из девяти классов. Каждый класс уникален и предполагает особый стиль игры.Также в игре есть некоторые RPG элементы. При получении определённых достижений вам даётся новое оружие. Иногда при убийстве врагов их оружие или предметы выпадают и их можно подобрать.Графика в Team Fortress 2 на высоте. Яркие краски и сочные спецэффекты.
Still a very nice game after all these years. Steam support replies very fast.
a wonderful little dressup game that even has a solid team-based shooter attached to it

There never was a game like Team Fortress 2 and there never will be, it isn't too balanced or too relevant these days but it's done one thing many shooters, and video games in general have failed to achieve, Longevity. Staying relevant for nearly 10 years and still going, Team Fortess 2 is a breath of fresh air for the shooting genre, offering so many unique and completely different game modes that keep you vibing throughout. Not counting the huge, creative (and sometimes rabbid) community constantly contributing to the game, perhaps even doing Valve's job for them. Creating art, custom game modes, custom maps, custom cosmetics and so much more, it very much revolutionized the shooting genre. Leading way for games such as Overwatch. 
 
This game pretty much has it all, an economy, a competitive community (albiet small), and endless ways to play. All of which may keep you playing for hours, days or even months, and NO DLC. All of this experience completely free. 

Love it or hate it, this is Team Fortress 2, and the world just wouldn't be the same without it.
Pen pine apple apple pen. Sums up this game pretty well. Love it lol.

By far one of the most entertaining, timeless, and classic titles I've ever gotten my hands on. I would recommend Tf2 to anyone who enjoys a wonderful god game that offers thousands of hours of entertainment along with thousands of unique ways to customize your favorite class!! Tf2 is an all time favorite of mine and will never be forgotten. This community needs more attention from its developers though!!! Don't let the flame die out valve!! This game needs love. Team Fortress 2 is most certainly worth the 7GiB of space it take up. Countless hours await upon downloading. One will tend to appreciate how risque and unique this lovely arcade shooter is. If you haven't played TF2 yet give it a shot! It's most certainly worth giving a try.

Best FPS game I've played forever! :D

edit : 
when heavy update

This game is very repetive and boring, the community is extremely toxic, weapons that need to be nerfed get buffed and weapons that need a buff get nerfed, cheater / exploiters are rarely ever dealt with, majority of server admins / moderatores / server donatores are all power hungry 6 year olds ( Looking at you Neon Heights and your constant death threats for 2 years straight) i mean ive seen servers that are hardly known about being staffed far better than these big servers, overall it has ruined my experience with this game, i may have 1,700+ hours on the game but that does not mean i enjoyed any of it.

i enjoyed the co-op mode far more than the majority of the game period, but sadly, a lot of the toxic players made their way there too, and ruined it for me.

I literally can not play TF2 without some angry killed coming to my profile and threatning to slit my throat all because i killed him, and to boot Valve does nothing about it despite it being wholey against Steams online conduct. which steam does nothing to enforce.

So my Verdict unless you want to deal with toxicity, i strongly suggest avoiding this game.

I loved this game and it became the thing I played each and everyday, the updates made things even better until about tough break. But if you look beyond it, it's a game that's stood beyond the test of time and I hope will survive this dark age. I wish for weapons like baby face, the pretty boy's pocket pistol, Claimdahmor, Righteous bison, and many others to be returned to their more fun alternatives. These weapons were everyone's favorite and I hope Valve may consider fixing them back to before tough break update had happened. I hope you f2p and p2p people are going to enjoy this game like I have. For I find it the gold medal of Valve's libary of games over Half life or Portal. Give this some love, this may be the last we see these 9 faces.
